name: Jewellust Platinum: match 3
description:
Burst jewels in the exciting new match 3 game!
The brilliant "match 3" free puzzle game for everybody who loves a magic atmosphere, ancient mysteries and a crystal chime of jewels.
Jewellust Platinum is a premium edition of our game Jewellust Endless. Tired of waiting and want to play more? Install Jewellust Platinum: unlimited lives, no annoying ads, 150 coins for free!
Go on a fascinating journey through deserts, oases of Ancient Egypt, jungle, pirate seas and dungeons! You will explore pharaoh’s treasuries, magic spells and unique artifacts that make the game even more interesting.

- enjoy 1000+ game missions (more new levels with game updates)
- match 3 jewels in a row or create powerful Bonuses with 4 or 5 gems to crush gems on the field
- mix Bonuses and get Super Bonuses
- use marvelous Magic Spells
- get reusable Boosters that are charged during the game
- unlock daily Pharaoh’s Roulette after first 25 missions
- pass mini adventures with new jewels to get unique skills
- earn valuable prizes in Treasure Troves

Unique combination of features sets Jewellust Platinum apart from other games in the genre of "match 3". This jewel game will bring you a lot of fun and you’ll definitely love it!
